thread.title: Selena Gomez dares to bare in sexy gold thong after she's spotted kissing The Weeknd
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez dares to bare in sexy gold thong after she's spotted kissing The Weeknd

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Selena Gomez dares to bare in sexy gold thong after she's spotted kissing The Weeknd
text:
Showbiz Selena Gomez dares to bare in sexy gold thong after she's spotted kissing The Weeknd The Come and Get It singer looks smoking hot in the risqué snap shared a day after she and The Weeknd went public with their blossoming romance Share Stripping off: Selena Gomez (Photo: Copyright unknown) Share Get     
Selena Gomez has stripped off for a very sexy snap. 
The star, 24, appears to have gone back on her November declaration where she told the American Music Awards audience: "I don’t want to see your bodies on Instagram. I want to see what’s in here [holds chest]." 
Instead, the star has sent temperatures soaring with the seriously hot shot, posted by fashion photographer Mert Alas, which shows her bare behind clad only in a tiny gold thong. 
Justin Bieber's stunning ex is covering the rest of her modesty with a white towel. 
"Beauty and the beast," Mert captioned it. https://www.instagram.com/p/BPJ7P2Bjhna/?taken-by=mertalas&hl=en/embed 
It comes after it was reported Selena and The Weeknd had planned to keep their budding romance a secret. 
The pair - who were spotted kissing outside a restaurant in Santa Monica - were reportedly keen to keep their romance to themselves at first but have now decided they're happy for people to find out about them. 
One source said: "At first, Selena and Abel wanted to keep their relationship a secret. But they've decided they really don't care if everyone knows about them." The former couple split two months ago (Photo: Wire Image) 
While another insider added: "Selena was focusing on getting herself back together and Abel was just getting out of a relationship, plus putting out his new album. 
"Abel and Bella also were on and off towards the end of their relationship, so getting into something brand new was not what Abel was looking for." Bella unfollowed Selena on Instagram hours after the pictures surfaced (Photo: Rex Features) Selena Gomez arrives at LAX Airport (Photo: Splash News) 
However, the Can't Feel My Face star - real name Abel Tesfaye - is said to have fancied the 24-year-old singer for some time. 
The source told E! News: "Abel though always had a thing for Selena. He thinks she is extremely talented and sexy. 
"They recently started talking before the holidays but she has been on his radar before. They are on the same level with expectations and think the other is really fun. They are taking things slow and getting to know each other." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch this video again Video will play in The Weeknd and Bella Hadid look happy on the red carpet before SHOCK Selena Gomez photos Share this video Watch Next 
The new relationship comes just two months after the 26-year-old singer split from model Bella Hadid who unfollowed Selena on Instagram just hours after the photos surfaced. 
Though the pair are said to have remained good friends since their relationship ended, with Bella recently praising her ex. Selena previously dated Justin Bieber (Photo: Getty) 
She said: "There is no awkwardness. He is my best friend, and I am excited because I am walking during his [Victoria's Secret] performance." 
Whilst a source added: "Bella and The Weeknd have been talking again. The Weeknd sent Bella something special to her room to wish her luck on her big day ... They are on great terms - not back together but still talking." Like us on Facebook
